topic.title: IP Version 6: Set-Up Procedures
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase Server supports IP version 6. Set-up is required for each platform.

section.title: IP Version 6 Overview
section.p: Support for IP version 6 is provided only by Couchbase Server Enterprise Edition. Set-up is required for each platform, as described in the sections below. The steps in each section should be performed as part of the installation procedure for the given platform. See Couchbase Server Installation Home for all basic information on server-installation.
